p: Table 5 evidences high concentrations of isobutyl isobutyrate, 1,8-cineole, and geranyl acetate in the CPT3 accession. The discriminating compound in this selection was Î±-terpinyl acetate, present only in CPT3. In the Laconi (LAC) accession the presence of p-cymenene was recognized in LAC11, which was not detected in other accessions. In the LAC10 clone, 10.63% of dihydroeugenyl butanoate was detected.
